marklogic.body:
Alan Cochrane wrote: " . . it’s true that he has a bit of rescue job to do on “that” Budget"
While you're enjoying your fifth course at that fancy French restaurant this coming Xmas, 5 million pensioners will be making a choice between adequate nutrition or adequate Heat. All as a result of "that budget".
Now you can afford to blow it Off because you will not be subject to the deprivations those most vulnerable in our society will have to bear.
But remember as you chow-down, wine, and chortle with the other affluent, that that sumptuous meal has been paid for with money taken right out of the purses of the poor and elderly.
